sqlMap.select: SELECT SRF.SYS_ROLE_FUNC_ID, SRF.ROLE_ID, SRF.FUNCTION_ID, SR.SYS_ROLE_NAME, SF.FUNCTION_NAME FROM SYS_ROLE_FUNCTION SRF, SYS_ROLE SR, SYS_FUNCTION SF WHERE SRF.ROLE_ID=SR.SYS_ROLE_ID AND SRF.FUNCTION_ID=SF.FUNCTION_ID ROLE_ID=#roleId# ORDER BY SYS_ROLE_FUNC_ID limit #pro_mysql#,#page_record#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYS_ROLE_FUNCTION SRF, SYS_ROLE SR, SYS_FUNCTION SF WHERE SRF.ROLE_ID=SR.SYS_ROLE_ID AND SRF.FUNCTION_ID=SF.FUNCTION_ID SRF.ROLE_ID=#roleId#
SELECT SF.FUNCTION_ID, SF.FUNCTION_NAME FROM SYS_FUNCTION SF WHERE SF.FUNCTION_ID NOT IN (SELECT SRF.FUNCTION_ID FROM SYS_ROLE_FUNCTION SRF WHERE SRF.ROLE_ID=#roleId#) AND SF.SYS_STATUS_ID=1
